page.title: 07Children's games
page.content: At school we play a variety of games. The most popular game is probably "321". First find a place to be the post and someone to be "on it". This person has to count to 60 while the others go and hide. When the person has finished counting, he looks for the others. When he has seen someone he goes back to the post and shouts "I see(so and so), behind (wherever he is)". The object of the game is to "save all". This is done by touching the post when the person on it is not looking and saying "321 I save all".The first person caught is on it next time. Any number of children can play this game together.
